attributes.action: MPs who have misled Parliament should be disbarred from public office.
attributes.additional_details: Politicians are increasingly viewed as individuals of little integrity and this proposal would help to increase their standing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for similar actions:

Make Lying In Public Office A Specific Criminal Offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593074

Require any MP or Peer convicted of a criminal offence be removed from office
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600515
